meanings.definition: Tantalates: excites the senses or desires of (someone)
meanings.sent1: The delicious smell of freshly baked cookies tantalates my taste buds.
meanings.sent2: The beautiful sunset tantalates the eyes of all who see it.
meanings.sent3: The tempting aroma of popcorn tantalates the moviegoers in the theater.
meanings.sent4: The intriguing plot of the mystery novel tantalates the reader's curiosity.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the painting tantalate the art lover's imagination.

meanings.definition: Tantalates: teases or torments with the sight or promise of something unattainable
meanings.sent1: The distant sound of the ice cream truck tantalates the children playing outside.
meanings.sent2: The unreachable toy on the top shelf tantalates the toddler.
meanings.sent3: The locked treasure chest tantalates the curious pirate crew.
meanings.sent4: The elusive butterfly tantalates the young girl trying to catch it.
meanings.sent5: The hidden key tantalates the adventurer exploring the ancient ruins.
